name: Darkness is not the end
description:
Originally made for Music Game Jam 2018

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

WARNING: THIS GAME USES 3D AUDIO, IT IS NECESSARY TO USE HEADPHONES/EARPHONES SO YOU CAN PLAY.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

Darkness is not the end is an audio-based game where you don't see your enemies. Although, you can hear their steps and that is the only way you can escape death. 

Help a blind swordsman fight an evil army by listening to their footsteps around you. Do you have what it takes to help him survive?

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

CONTROLS:

Left and Arrow keys - Change Direction

SPACE - Attack/Skip Intros

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

A HUGE thanks to Zughy (Twitter: @_Zughy) for providing me with his amazing japanese speaking skills to make the introduction a bit more rich!

Programming, Art, Design, Music - Zushi (Twitter: @Zushi3DHero)

SFX - POND5

Intro voice - Zughy (Twitter: @_Zughy)
